abstract: Colombian police chief, Gen Rodolfo Palomino, resigns amid accusations of illegal enrichment and sexual misconduct with cadets.
lead_paragraph: The chief, Gen. Rodolfo Palomino, resigned Wednesday amid accusations of illegal enrichment and sexual misconduct with young cadets.

headline.main: Colombia: Chief of Police Steps Down
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Colombia: Chief of Police Steps Down

snippet: The chief, Gen. Rodolfo Palomino, resigned Wednesday amid accusations of illegal enrichment and sexual misconduct with young cadets.
